mapper.select: select XSZDXGCJSMJWM, XSZDXGCSJCG, XSZDXGCSJXZ, XXSLGGJJY, XXSLJXYSCZ, XXSLSCZRLWF, XXSLSJKRWF, XXSLXXSKZ, XZLSCNGCJSMJWM, XZLSCNGCSJCG, XZLSCNGCSJXZ, ZXGQQKGGQNSK, ZXGQQKGHMJWM, ZXGQQKSLG from "GP_SZZF_N"."JC_QSGGQK" ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC;
select CSGWYSGCCSC, CSGWYSGCSJXZCSG, CSGWYSGCSYRKWR, DCJZGSGCCSC, DCJZGSGCSJXZCSG, DCJZGSGCSYRKWR, LCJZGSGCCSC, LCJZGSGCSJXZCSG, LCJZGSGCSYRKWR from "GP_SZZF_N"."JC_GPSNCYSQKFLB" where ND = #{year}
select AZLSQKF_WRH_SJXZCSG, AZLSQKF_WRH_SJZRCSG, AZLSQKF_ZH_SJXZCSG, AZLSQKF_ZH_SJZRCSGSG, AZLSQKF_ZLSRH_SJXZCSG, AZLSQKF_ZLSRH_SJZRCSG from "GP_SZZF_N"."JC_GPSNCYSQKFLB" where ND = #{year}
select NY,XQJYL6Y,XQJYL7Y,XQJYL8Y,XQJYL9Y from "GP_SZZF_N"."JC_GPSSHZHFZJSQK" order by NY desc;
